content: holding onto yarn over and pull through just that loop now insert your hook into the third loop you are holding onto yarn over and pull through just that loop you will again have three loops on your hook repeat to desired length and fasten_off leaving a very long end tail repeat making 2nd cord note - youtube has great tutorials for this - just use crochet i-cord in your search poms 2 using a tapestry needle thread the long end tail of your cord through the center of your pom now thread it back through the pom and all the way up into your i-cord tie the star\ng and ending tails of your i-cord together being careful not to bunch up the cord repeat for your 2nd pom using your tapestry needle a0ach the cords on the inside of the hat
